properties.displayName: Service DACL Abuse To Hide Services Via Sc.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "sdset" and ProcessCommandLine contains "DCLCWPDTSD") and (FolderPath endswith "\\sc.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "sc.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects usage of the "sc.exe" utility adding a new service with special permission seen used by threat actors which makes the service hidden and unremovable.
